name: account_migration_user_pool
description: This table stores information related to the migration of user accounts within the non-production UAT gold zone environment.

columns.name: job_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the migration job.

columns.name: cif_number
columns.description: Unique identifier for the customer in the bank's system.

columns.name: account_number
columns.description: Unique number assigned to a customer's bank account.

columns.name: product_type
columns.description: Type of financial product or account being migrated.

columns.name: data
columns.description: Serialized data related to the account migration.

columns.name: run_date
columns.description: Date when the migration job was executed.

columns.name: run_timestamp
columns.description: Exact time when the migration job was executed.

columns.name: modified_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp of the last modification made to the record.

columns.name: query
columns.description: Query used during the migration process.

columns.name: registry_postgres_table
columns.description: Name of the Postgres table used for registry purposes.

columns.name: key_template
columns.description: Template for generating keys during migration.

columns.name: value_template
columns.description: Template for generating values during migration.

columns.name: interestresolvetype
columns.description: Type of interest resolution applied to the account.

columns.name: depositnonterminterestcode
columns.description: Code representing the non-term interest applied to deposits.

columns.name: status
columns.description: Current status of the migration job.

columns.name: error_msg
columns.description: Message describing any errors encountered during migration.

columns.name: customer_tenant
columns.description: Identifier for the customer's tenant in a multi-tenant environment.
